Title: CEO and Co-Founder
Description: •	Founded and lead CashQ, a U.S.-licensed platform for cross-border payment infrastructure •	Designed AI-driven, compliance-first architecture, ensuring readiness for global regulations (CIP/KYC, AML, sanctions) •	Developed a “borderless Zelle”, enabling instant international payments through distributed alias directories •	Forged partnerships with banks and payout providers, opening payment corridors across 150+ countries

Title: Co-Founder
Description: •	Co-founded self-service infrastructure platform for international payments and remittance ATMs •	Built and launched real-time payments infrastructure in 25 countries with multiple enterprise clients •	Delivered secure and scalable cross-border payment solutions, enhancing transaction efficiency and reliability

Title: Executive Partner
Description: • Spearheaded U.S. operations for Bantec USA, an international banking and payments company, driving innovative transaction solutions.   • Established a robust B2B financial infrastructure, facilitating cross-border remittances and compliance-driven payment services.   • Cultivated strategic partnerships with banks and fintech providers, significantly expanding market reach and enhancing service offerings.

Title: Partner
Description: •	Spearheaded the development of a nationwide payment infrastructure platform, fully licensed by the Bank of Zambia •	Collaborated with major mobile money providers (Airtel, MTN, Zamtel) to expand reach and drive financial inclusion •	Enabled secure digital transactions across retail, mobile, and remittance channels •	Launched one of Zambia’s first regulated payment networks, ensuring compliance with central bank standards
